title: Minecraft Mobs
subtitle: Which Minecraft mob matches your vibe?

questions.prompt: Your team is building at night in a cave.

answers.label: Scout first and mark the safest path
Light up the area and push forward
Stay with your close crew
Ask for supplies and make a plan

questions.prompt: A villager asks for help defending crops.

answers.label: Build defensive fences quickly
Talk to nearby friends and organize
Create a funny decoy with redstone
Stay calm and keep watch

questions.prompt: You find a zombie approaching at dusk.

answers.label: Fight it with quick action
Use blocks to trap and contain
Signal teammates and help everyone
Record and study its behavior

questions.prompt: A wolf is lonely near your base.

answers.label: Feed and befriend it
Train it for a guard role
Watch closely before touching
Run around and play with it

questions.prompt: A surprise creeper is near your workbench.

answers.label: Try a creative defense in seconds
Keep calm and move everyone quickly
Use it as an exciting build challenge
Alert your trusted team before act

questions.prompt: You need to cross a swampy biome fast.

answers.label: Build bridges and keep moving
Find the safest path first
Tag-team with cat and enderman
Turn it into a silly obstacle race

questions.prompt: Your base is finished and you can choose a flag.

answers.label: A strong, protective emblem
A design with hidden patterns
A friendly symbol for guests

questions.prompt: A new player asks for your advice.

answers.label: Give them fearless combat tips

characters.name: Creeper
characters.bio: You bring bold energy and big surprises to moments.

characters.name: Enderman
characters.bio: You stay calm and study everything before acting.

characters.name: Zombie
characters.bio: You are durable, steady, and unlikely to quit.

characters.name: Skeleton
characters.bio: You think in lines and plans, then carry them out.

characters.name: Spider
characters.bio: You are fast, curious, and good at spotting hidden paths.

characters.name: Villager
characters.bio: You care about community and steady teamwork.

characters.name: Wolf
characters.bio: You protect your allies and never abandon your pack.

characters.name: Cat
characters.bio: You balance caution with playful discovery.

characters.name: Iron Golem
characters.bio: You are calm, brave, and always ready to protect.

characters.name: Slime
characters.bio: You bounce back fast and keep the mood fun.
